timeline.message: GH-2303 format the formatting xml file

GH-2303 formatting rules relaxed:

- preserve line break settings for parenthesized expressions as much as possible
- use single indent for wrapped expressions
- format the formatting xml file
- bump formatter plugin version to 2.12.0
- indentation cleanup

GH-2303 formatting rules relaxed:

- preserve line break settings for parenthesized expressions as much as possible
- use single indent for wrapped expressions

GH-2303 fix indentation in existing files

timeline.bodyText: example of how parentheses are now allowed to be indented/wrapped. It preserves positions set by the programmer, so if you keep it all on one line it won't correct that.
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: Also note that everything that wraps is now indented with a single indent, instead of two indents. Hence the big diff.
replies.author: jeenbroekstra
